div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem antepenultimo
die octobris

The said' day the prouest and balyeis assignit this day xv dais to Duncane Wandy
to bring Johne mar' befor thame tile ansuer' tile Androw litstar for Johne mar'
for iiij pec' of woll jc lentrinwair and viij d' of Siluer becaus' he said'
the saide Johne mar' fra Johne Cuk officiar' et cetera Ande gif he presentis nocht the
saide Johne mair' the saide day that the said' Duncan sale ansuer' for him
to the said' Androw in the premis'

The saide day It was statut and ordanit be the prouest balyeis ande
Counsale that nayne vnfre folkis by wittale in the mercat nor' yet
mak price bot tak ane part to sted' thame fra fre folkis that byis
and makis the price Ande that nay persone by bot ane laid' of wittale
one ane day vndir the pane of viij s' and eschet of the wittale

The said' day It was statut and ordanit be the prouest balyeis and counsale
that euer persone Selling ayle within this burghe furnis' and haue ane tynning
pont Signat with the commone stamp of the towne within xv dais hereftir
vndir the pane of escheting of the wescheale and viij s' vnforgevin
Ande thai sale bring thar pontis to Williame Stile peuterour' and mellis
thame with the commone Ingale and caus' him to signat the samyn
with the stamp and giwe to him j d' for euer pont quarter or chopin'
for his labour

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem tercio die mensis
Nouembris anno Dominj millesimo quingentesimo septimo

div.head: Inquisicio Agnetis cullane
div.p:
Inquisicio facta apud burgum de Abirdene tercio die mensis Nouembris anno Dominj Millesimo
quingentesimo Septimo Coram honorabilibus viris gilberto menyeis preposito Dauid mar' vno
balliuorum dicti burgi in pretorio eiusdem protribunali sedenti per subscripti videlicet Johannem
ruthirfurd' militem Jacobum Colisone thomam Waus thomam leslie Alexandrum mar' Alexandrum
Malisone Dauid Kintor Willelmum Wormet Willelmum Kintor Duncanum smitht Ka
ralum stevinsone patricium leslie Juniorem et Willelmum cheishame burgenses dicti burgi Quj
Jurati dicunt quod quondam thomas Cullane paternis Agnetis Cullane latricis presencium
Obiit vltra vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis de
vno crofto Jacente infra territorium occidentali croftorum dicti burgi ex australi
parte vie regie qua Itur ad molendina Justiciarij inter Croftum quondam thome prat
ex orientali ex vna et communiones vias regias ex occidentali et boreali partibus et terras de
frertoune et ferehill versus Austrum Et quod dicta Agnes est vna de legittimis et
propinquioribus heredibus dicti quondam thome auj patricij suj de dicto Crofto cum pertinencijs Et quod
est legittime etatis Et quod dictum Croftum valet nunc per annum viginti solidos et
valuit quindecim solidos tempore pacis Et quod tenetur in Capite de
Suppremo domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium Et nunc existit In manibus
domini nostri Regis per Spacium Octo viginti dierum per puram et simplicem dimissionem Renunciacionj coniuncte
Infeodacionis eiusdem crofti per Agnetem club Relictam quondam dicte thome Cullan'
presens coniunctam Infeodacionum halentis et vsque in habent in defectu virj heredis Jus suum
hucusque minime prosequentis datis et clausis sub Sigillo dicti Dauid mar' balliuj
ac Sigillis quondam eorum qui huic Inquisicionj intererant faciendum anno die mense
et loco prenotatis

Iidem Jurati dicunt quod Katherina Cullan est vna de legittmis et propinquioribus
heredibus dicti thome Cullane auis paternis suj de dicto Crofto cum pertinenciis et sic in omnibus
ut in predicta Inquisicione expremitur et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem quinto die mensis
Nouembris anno Domini millesimo quingentesimo septimo

The said day the bilyes assignit monunday that nixt cumis to Androw
Edindeauche to ansueir to the borgh' fundin one him be androw low
skynner for the wranguis' withthalding fra him of ane harthid'

div.head: Inquisicio Elene Knollis
div.p:
Inquisicio facta apud burgum de Abirdene quinto die mensis ap Nouembris anno Dominj Millesimo quingentesimo
septimo Coram honorabilibus viris gilberto menyeis preposito Dauid mar' patricio leslie et Willelmo
portar' tribus balliuorum dicti burgi in pretorio eiusdem protribunali sedenti per subscriptos
videlicet Johannem Ruthirfurd' militem Johannem Cullane Johannem colisone Jacobum Colison'
thomam leslie thomam leslie thomam Wode Alexandrum gray Willelmum Wormet Alexandrum malison'
thomam chamer Dauid Ruthirfurd' Johannem moir' et Duncanum Smytht burgenses dicti
burgi Qui Jurati dicunt quod quondam Johannes Knollis auus elene Knollis latricis
presencium obiit vltra vestitus et Sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri
Regis de vno annuo Redditu quatuordecim solidorum de terra quondam Alexandri
logy ex australi ex vna et terram quondam Duncanj lundoris ex boreali partibus ab altera
Et de vno annuo Redditu decim solidorum de terra Ninianj blinsale Jacente
in eodem vico inter terram quondam Roberti blinsale ex australi ex vna et terram dicti quondam
alexandrum logy ex boreali partibus ab altera et communiones vias regias versus oriens et occidens
Et quod dicta elena est vna de legittimis et propinquior heredibus quondam dicti Johannis
auj suj de dictis heredibus annuis redditibus cum pertinenciis Et quod est legittime
etatis Et valor eorundem patet Et quod dicti annuj Redditus cum pertinenciis
tenentur in Capite de Suppremo domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium Et quod
dictj annuj Redditus inter existunt in manibus domini nostri Regis legitime per seipsum
ob decessum dicti quondam Johannis Knollis aui suj per Spacium quatuordecim
annorum aut eocirca in defectu virj heredis Jus suum hucusque minime prosequentis

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio
eiusdem octauo die mensis Nouembris Anno quo supra

The said day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' thomas
lesly forspekar that thomas pill sale counpt and raknyne
witht Johnne forstar betuix this and' monunday that nixt cumis
anent xj s' and' iiij d' clamyt be the said Johnne awing
him be the said' thomas pill and' quhat that the said thomas
preuis pait of the said xj s' and iiij d' pait to be allouit to him
in the said Some and' gif the said thomas preuis nocht
to pay the haill Some

The said day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' thomas
lesly forspekar that Androw low skynnar laid in wed to him
of iiij s' or thame ane hart hid als gud as it was / and' to
ressaue iiij s' fray the said Androw lowe quhilk he lent
to him apon' the said hart hidis / or than the price of the said hid

The said' day the belman at commavnde of the balyeis
In the townis name and chagit ale and Sindrie personis to ger'
Remoiwe ale fyltht stanis and mvk being befor thar durris eftir
the tenor of the Statut maid' tharpon' vndir the pane
of eschet of the stanis and viij s' of euere persone vnforgevin

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xv die
mensis nouembris anno quo supra

The said day James kneyf grauntit that ser Jonhne ruthirfurd' his
mastir wantis xiiij barellis of atis of his grange of this yer' bigane
that suld' haue ansuered' to the preiwe and he was ane of the
taskaris that thressit the said' corne

head.add: Anent the defens' of the assedacioun'

div.p:
The saide day thir personis eftir follouing that is to say gilbert menyes
aldirman Dauid menyeis ser Johne ruthirfurde Androw Cullane thomas
chamer thomas leslie Androw fyf thomas Waus Alexander mar' William
portar thomas Wode Johne mar' mastir James Cumyn' Johne Colison'
James Colisone patry Rede Alexander malysone Dauid theman William
Wormet Alexander blinsele Malcome Crag for his gude modir george
bysset patry leslie Williame Kintor patry chernsid' gavane of
murray Williame vmfray Jonet litstar Elizibetht blinsele

head.add: the prising of ane corce and j ring

div.p:
The said day Dauid theman and Dauid brois' goldsmithtis and
burges of the said burgh' at command' of Williame portar
ane of the bailyes of the said burgh' prisit ane cors' of gold'
weyand' half ane vnce and half ane vnicorn' weitht to
lviij s' and' vj d' and ane ring of gold witht ane blew stan'
till ane franche crovne in ale thingis be thair aithtis quhilk
was present to the said bailye be mathou ros' seruitour till
ane wirschipfull man ser alexander monemeill parsone of forbes
and' was laid to him in wed' for certane money that
is to say the said cors' for iij franche crovnis and the
said ring for ane vnicorne of gold

The said' day the balyeis chargit Norman leslie officiar'
to pas' and distrenye James neyf for vij bollis of atis aving
to ser Johne ruthirfurd' of his Corne quhilkis he hed' in thressing
and caus' the said' knicht be pait tharof

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xix die Nouembris
anno quo supra

The saide day Alexander ramsay grauntit to deliuer to Androw michellsone
ane Suerd' be the fest of Sanct nicholes next hereftir quhilk he
borrouit at him

Curia balliuorum burgj de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxij die
mensis nouembris anno quo Supra

The said' day Alexander hay Oblist him be his vphaldin tile abide and
stande at the ordinance of gilbert menyeis aldirman and mastir Johne
lindesay vicar of colsalmonde anent the summonce maid' be the said
Alexander one Johne Cuk ane of the officiaris of the said' burghe' anent
ane quartar befor our Souerane lorde and his Counsale

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxvj
die mensis Nouembris anno quo supra

The said day It was fundin and deliuerit be the counsaill present for the
tyme that the lokis put one margret craufurd' loft dur be takin
of becaus thai war vnordourly put on' And' henry red' and ser
Johnne red grantit to tak of the said lokis incontinent And' thareftir thai
ordanit Androw Nachtj officiar to pas and gar tak of the said
lokis

The said day the bailyes g chargit Androw Wrycht cordinar to pay to
William Wormet the price of the cauus quhilk he come borgh' for
to the said William withtin xv dais

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxvj die Nouembris
anno quo supra

The said' day Alexander burnat was conuict be ane suorne assis' Johne
Colisone forspekar' for tribulance of Alexander hay for the quhilkis he was
in amerciament of the court and tile amend' as lawe wile and forbeir' in tym'
to Cum And' the said Alexander was conuict for trubulance of the said' Alexander
burnat in word' lichtlie et cetera for the quhilkis he was in Amerciament of the
court and to Amend' as law wile et cetera

The said' day Williame Scottisman and clays flemyng was conuict' be
ane Suorne assis' Johne Colysone forspekar for trubulance of Dauid archebald'
for the quhilkis Ilkan of thame was in Amerciament and tile amend' as law wile
and forbeir' in tme to cum Ande the said Dauid was quyt of ale trubulance
of the saide Williame and clays for the quhilkis the said William and clays
sale Restoir' to the said' Dauid his hat or the vale of tham
and Ilkan of thame pay to S the haly blud' licht j li' of wax

The said' day Alexander brabner' Cristy Symmir and the widew of henry
lorne was resplatit and remittit be the aldirman bailyeis and assis' fo the
mercat Spilling and housin of wittalis Ande gif euer thai or ony
ane of thame happinnis to be conuict' for ony of the said' actiouis
sale pay xl s' to Sanct nicholes werk

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem quarto die
mensis Decembris anno quo supra et cetera

Inquisicio facta apud burgum de Abirdene quarto die mensis Decembris
anno Domini millesimo quingentesimo septimo coram honorabilibus viris
Dauid mar patricio lesly Willelmo portar tribus balliuorum burgj
de Abirdene in pretorio eiusdem protribunali sedenti Per subscriptum
videlicet Johannem ruthirfurd' militem Johannem colisone Jacobum colisone andream
ffif Alexandrum malisone Johanne andersone Dauid fynne Mal
comum crag Willelmum rolland' richardum Waus Alexandrum burnat
Andream meldrum et Duncanum smitht burgenses dictj burgj Quj
Juratj dicunt quod quondam Dauid crukschank alias tailyour
auis Johannis crukschank latoris presncium obiit vltimo vestitus et
Sasitus vt de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri regis de vna
terra anteriore cum pertinencijs Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico inferiore
ecclesie ex boreali parte eiusdem inter Communionem viam regiam ex orientali
ex vna et terram georgei bisset ex occidentali partibus ab altera
Et alteram viam regiam versus austrum et terram quondam Jacobi andirson'
versus boream Et quod dictus Johannes est legittimus et propinquior heres
eiusdem quondam Dauid auj suj de dicta terra cum pertinenciis Et quod est legittime
etatis Et quod dicta terra cum pertinenciis valet nunc per annum x s' Et valuit
v s' tempore pacis Et quod tenetur in capite de suppremo domino nostro
rege per seruicium burgagium per decessum quondam
relicta quondam dictj Dauid auj suj coniunctam Infeodacionem terre eiusdem habentis
per spacium terram mensuum aut eocirca in defectu verj heredis Jus
suum hucusque minime prosequentis datis et clausis sub Sigillo dictj
balliuj ac Sigillis quorundum eorum quj huic
Inquisicionj Intererant faciendum anno die mense et loco prenotatis

The saide day Dauid talyour grauntit him borghe tile Johne andirsone
burges of this burghe for fyve hidis the tane half oxin hidis and the tothir
half cowe hidis for Johne falconare in cowy quhilkis the balyeis charge him
to pay within terme of lawe

The saide day trhe balyeis assignit friday the tend' day of Decembir'
Instant to Johne Colisone and Robert Waus to preiwe that Robert murray
hade Sellit to thame ane punde of taseat for xl s'

head.add: the assignacioun maid to James Colisone marouschipe

div.p:
The said' day the alderman and balyeis assignit and ordanit thomas
Wod to marowe and streik his half nethis one the wattir of Done
pertening to Androw Wele his brothir vith James Colisonez half neth'
of the said' wattir eftir the tenor of the assedacioun' generale of
the said' burghe'

The saide day the Court fand' and deliuerit that Androw skynner
awe to releiwe and freith Androwe edindeauche of ane hart
hide quhilk he Intromettit with pertening tile Androw low burgis
avne toung graunt

head.add: the feing of Robert crak Sangstar

div.p:
The saide day the alderman balyeis and counsale present for the
tyme conducit and feit Robert Crak Sangstar for ane yer hereftir
to Remane and mak dalie continuale gude seruice and Syng in
the parroche kirk of the saide burghe at matutynis mess'
evinsangis Completoriis et cetera and vthir divine songe seruice
ffor the quhilkis thai promittit to gif him his mett and drink
Circualy ymange gude nychtbouris of the towne and xl schillingis
quhilkis the Alderman and the dene of gilde grantit to pay to
the saide Robert and he Oblist him to reman with thame for ane
yer' to mak thame gud seruice

The saide day thomas buchan grauntit the assedacioun' be him
maide to Jonhne of Kennerty vndir his Seile and to fulfile ale the
pontis contenit in It

The saide day Comperit William Rollande and offerit him redy with his
folkis chosin for him to Sett one the compt betuix him and Dauid colp
protestande sene he was redy that it suld' turne him to nay preiudice
Ande in continent patry leslie eldar Androw fyf and James strathachin chosin
be the said' Williame offerit thame redy to tak the said' matir to thame
and deliuer tharintile with the personis chosin be the said' Dauid'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimo
die Decembris Anno quo supra

The saide day Johne mar' grauntit to fre the lande liand' in the chakir
rawe tile alexander gray sene he tuk possessioun' of It

The saide day Richerde Wricht grauntit him aving to Johne flessour
iiij s' and iiij d' quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay within terme
of law

The saide day James Smytht skynnere grantit him feit seruand'
for ane yer' tile Williame skynnere for task werk and to pas' with
him to the fairis for mett drink and fee

The said' day Robert murray lauchfullie warnit Callit and nocht
comperit tile her' the preuis producit agan him be Johne Colison'
anent ane punde of taseat et cetera tharfor the balyeis continevit the
said' Actioun' to monunday that next Cumys

The said' day patry chernsid' lauchfullie warnit callit and
nocht comperit tile ansuer' at the Instance of Androw Cullan

The saide day Robert edindeache was conuict be ane suorne assis'
James Colisone forspekar for forstallin of the burghe in bying of
hydis Ande for forstallin of the burghe in bying of Skinnis for the
quhilkis he was in tua amerciamentis of the court and tile amende as
lawe wile and forber' in tyme to Cum

The saide day Jonhne thomasone was conuict' be ane suorne assis'
James Colisone forspekar for forstallin of the burghe' in bying of
hidis Ande forstallin of the burghe' in bying of Skinnis for the
quhilkis he was in tua amerciamentis of the Court and tile amende as
law wile and forber' in tyme to Cum

The said' day nichole baxtar in Deir' was conuict' be his avne tong
graunt for forstallin of the burghe in Regratin tappin of Salt
et cetera and tile amend' as law wile and forber' in tyme to Cum
